channel.title: Process on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Process on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Labs - New Member Onboarding
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: New members joining our Labs team can be recommended either personally by an existing team member or through a development plan survey.

item.title: Labs - Topic proposal & progress tracking
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Selecting the right R&D topics is crucial for our organization’s growth. Currently, we are inviting topic proposals specifically from members of our labs, consulting and operation teams.

item.title: Labs x Consulting Workflow
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This workflow consolidates how new tech is introduced through the Labs team and how it gets processed to Consulting team to apply for projects and bring awareness of our tech expertise.

item.title: Reward Model & Nomination
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our Tech Labs is a hub of continuous learning and application of advanced technologies. This program is designed to celebrate contributions at various levels, from enhancing knowledge to contributing to business growth.
